amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit funds under the Act from being used to exercise the power of eminent domain without payment of just compensation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-570 to prohibit funds under the Act from being used to exercise the power of eminent domain without payment of just compensation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gingrey (GA) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Gingrey (GA).
